# <a name="compiler-error-cs0015"></a><span data-ttu-id="ebe07-103">Chyba kompilátoru CS0015</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebe07-103">Compiler Error CS0015</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ebe07-104">Název typu ' type ' je příliš dlouhý.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebe07-104">The name of type 'type' is too long</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ebe07-105">Plně kvalifikovaný název uživatelsky definovaného typu musí mít méně než 1024 znaků, včetně teček.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebe07-105">The fully qualified name of a user-defined type must have fewer than 1024 characters, including the periods.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ebe07-106">Následující ukázka generuje CS0015:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebe07-106">The following sample generates CS0015:</span></span>

```csharp
// CS0015.cs

// Remove a C from one of the namespace names or the class name to resolve the error by
// reducing the number of characters in the qualified class name to fewer than 1024.

namespace CC
{
    // The following namespace name has 510 characters.
    namespace 
    {
        // The following class name has 510 characters. The qualified class name,
        // CC.CCC510chars…C.CCCC510chars…C (namespace.namespace.class), has 1024
        // characters, which causes compiler error CS0015.
        public class 
        {
            public static void Main()
            {
            }
        }
    }
}
```
